title: Molten Fury
summaries: The Molten Fury is a pre-Hardmode bow that lights ordinary Wooden Arrows ablaze, effectively transforming them into Flaming Arrows, and causing them to emit light and inflict the On Fire! debuff to enemies it hits. Other arrow types fired from Molten Fury will retain their original properties. Wooden Arrows do not inherit the increased damage of actual Flaming Arrows. However, they do have a 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance to drop as one rather than a Wooden Arrow when they hit an enemy.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, the Molten Fury has the highest base damage of all bows available prior to Hardmode. On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, it is beaten only by the Sharanga.
